hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/lib/jenkins
rm -rf New-JenkinsBackUp
git clone git@github.com:Pratikshamandale/New-JenkinsBackUp.git
cp *.xml New-JenkinsBackUp/. cp *.key New-JenkinsBackUp/. rsync -am --include='config.xml' --include='*/' --prune-empty-dirs --exclude='*' ./users New-JenkinsBackUp/. rsync -am --include='config.xml' --include='*/' --prune-empty-dirs --exclude='*' ./jobs New-JenkinsBackUp/. rsync -am --include='config.xml' --include='*/' --prune-empty-dirs --exclude='*' ./secrets New-JenkinsBackUp/.
cd New-JenkinsBackUp git add -A
git commit -m "Jenkins ${JENKINS_MASTER} config backup for $(date)"
git push origin master
